TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OdbcDataReader extends System.Data.Common.DbDataReader
Public NotInheritable Class OdbcDataReader Inherits DbDataReader
public ref class OdbcDataReader sealed : System::Data::Common::DbDataReader

summary.span: 提供从数据源读取数据行的只进流的方法。

span.span: Provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of data rows from a data source.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建，必须调用方法的对象，而不是直接使用构造函数。To create an , you must call the method of the object, instead of directly using a constructor. 虽然正在使用中，关联是繁忙的服务，并可以在执行任何其他操作而不关闭它。While the is being used, the associated is busy serving the , and no other operations can be performed on the other than closing it. 这是种情况一直方法的调用。This is the case until the method of the is called. 例如，不能检索输出参数，直到调用后。For example, you cannot retrieve output parameters until after you call . 对结果集由另一个进程或线程读取数据时所做的更改可能会对用户可见。Changes made to a result set by another process or thread while data is being read may be visible to the user of the . 但是，确切的行为是驱动程序和取决于执行时间。However, the precise behavior is both driver and timing dependent. 并是后可以调用的唯一属性已关闭。 and are the only properties that you can call after the is closed. 有时，您必须调用调用之前。Sometimes, you must call before you can call . ## Examples 下面的示例创建、 一个，和一个。The following example creates an , an , and an . 该示例读取数据，将其写到控制台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最后，该示例关闭，然后。Finally, the example closes the , and then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: DataAdapters and DataReaders

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭 对象。

span.span: Closes the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须显式调用方法完成后使用使用关联用于任何其他用途。You must explicitly call the method when you are finished using the to use the associated for any other purpose. > [!CAUTION] > 不要调用`Close`或`Dispose`连接、 DataReader 或在任何其他托管的对象上`Finalize`类的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，您应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建、 一个，和一个。The following example creates an , an , and an . 该示例读取数据，将其写到控制台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最后，该示例关闭，然后。Finally, the example closes the , and then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前行中的列数。

span.span: Gets the number of columns in the current row.

value.span: 如果不是位于有效的记录集中，则为 0；否则为当前记录的列数。

span.span: When not positioned in a valid record set, 0; otherwise the number of columns in the current record.
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包括隐藏的字段。Includes hidden fields. 使用 可排除隐藏的字段。Use to exclude hidden fields. 执行不返回行，一个查询后返回 0。After you execute a query that does not return rows, returns 0.

override this.GetBytes : int * int64 * byte[] * int * int -> int64

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: dataIndex
param.span: 字段中读取操作开始位置的索引。

span.span: The index within the field where the read operation is to start.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要读入字节流的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.

param.name: bufferIndex
param.span: 中写入操作开始位置的索引。

span.span: The index within the where the write operation is to start.
The number of bytes to read.

summary.span: 从指定的列偏移量将字节流作为数组从特定的缓冲区偏移量开始读入缓冲区。

span.span: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the particular buffer offset.

returns.span: 读取的实际字节数。

span.span: The actual number of bytes read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回字段中的可用字节数。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 大多数情况下，这是该字段的确切长度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 但是，返回的数字可能小于字段的真实长度如果具有用于从字段中获取字节。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 这可能情况下，例如，如果正在读取到缓冲区中的大型数据结构。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅`SequentialAccess`设置为。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 如果传递的缓冲区，则 null 值，返回的字段长度以字节为单位。If you pass a buffer that is a null value, returns the length of the field in bytes. 转换被执行基于 ODBC 驱动程序的基础功能。Conversions are performed based on the underlying capabilities of the ODBC driver. 如果不支持该转换将失败的方法调用。If the conversion is not supported then the method call will fail. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发任何异常的值`bufferIndex`超出数组范围。No exception will be thrown if the value of `bufferIndex` is outside the array. 将读取任何数据，该方法将返回 0。No data will be read and the method will return 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回字段中的可用字符数。 returns the number of available characters in the field. 大多数情况下，这是该字段的确切长度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 但是，返回的数字可能小于字段的真实长度如果具有用于从字段获取字符。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if has already been used to obtain characters from the field. 这可能情况下，例如，如果正在读取到缓冲区中的大型数据结构。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅`SequentialAccess`设置为。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 如果传递的缓冲区，则 null 值，以字符为单位返回字段的长度。If you pass a buffer that is a null value, returns the length of the field in characters. 转换被执行基于 ODBC 驱动程序的基础功能。Conversions are performed based on the underlying capabilities of the ODBC driver. 如果不支持该转换将失败的方法调用。If the conversion is not supported then the method call will fail. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发任何异常的值`bufferIndex`超出数组范围。No exception will be thrown if the value of `bufferIndex` is outside the array. 将读取任何数据，该方法将返回 0。No data will be read and the method will return 0.

returns.span: 从零开始的列序号。

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次执行区分大小写查找。 performs a case-sensitive lookup first. 如果失败，进行第二个的不区分大小写搜索。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. 该方法将引发`IndexOutOfRange`异常，如果找不到从零开始的列序号。The method throws an `IndexOutOfRange` exception if the zero-based column ordinal is not found. 不区分假名宽度。 is kana-width insensitive. 因为基于序号的查找比命名查找更有效，它是效率低下调用在循环内。Because ordinal-based lookups are more efficient than named lookups, it is inefficient to call within a loop. 改为调用一次，然后将分配给整数变量的结果，请使用在循环中。Instead, call one time and then assign the results to an integer variable for use within the loop. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: DataAdapters and DataReaders

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchemaTable() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchemaTable () As DataTable

summary.span: 返回一个描述 的列元数据的 。

span.span: Returns a that describes the column metadata of the .

returns.span: 一个描述列元数据的 。

span.span: A that describes the column metadata.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法按以下顺序返回有关每个列的元数据：The method returns metadata about each column in the following order: |DataReader 列DataReader column|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |列名ColumnName|列; 的名称这可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果无法确定列名称，则返回 null 值。If the column name cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 此名称始终反映当前视图或命令文本中的列的最新的命名。This name always reflects the most recent naming of the column in the current view or command text.| |ColumnOrdinalColumnOrdinal|从零开始的列序号。The zero-based ordinal of the column. 此列不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |ColumnSizeColumnSize|列中值的最大可取长度。The maximum possible length of a value in the column. 对于使用固定长度的数据类型的列，这是数据类型的大小。For columns that use a fixed-length data type, this is the size of the data type.| |NumericPrecisionNumericPrecision|如果是数值数据类型，这是列的最大精度。If is a numeric data type, this is the maximum precision of the column. 精度取决于列的定义。The precision depends on the definition of the column. 如果不是数值数据类型，不在本专栏中使用的数据。If is not a numeric data type, do not use the data in this column. 如果基础 ODBC 驱动程序返回非数字数据类型的精度值，则架构表中使用此值。If the underlying ODBC driver returns a precision value for a non-numeric data type, this value is used in the schema table.| |NumericScaleNumericScale|如果是，小数点右侧的位数。If is , the number of digits to the right of the decimal point. 否则，这是一个 null 值。Otherwise, this is a null value. 如果基础 ODBC 驱动程序返回非数字数据类型的精度值，则架构表中使用此值。If the underlying ODBC driver returns a precision value for a non-numeric data type, this value is used in the schema table.| |数据类型DataType|映射到公共语言运行时类型的。Maps to the common language runtime type of .| |提供程序类型ProviderType|基础的驱动程序类型。The underlying driver type.| |IsLongIsLong|`true` 如果列包含二进制长对象 (BLOB)，包含非常长的数据。`true` if the column contains a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data. 很长数据的定义是特定于驱动程序。The definition of very long data is driver-specific.| |AllowDBNullAllowDBNull|`true` 如果使用者可以将列设置为 null 值，或驱动程序无法确定使用者是否可以将列设置为 null 值。`true` if the consumer can set the column to a null value or if the driver cannot determine whether the consumer can set the column to a null value. 否则为 `false`。Otherwise, `false`. 列可能包含 null 值，即使它不能设置为 null 值。A column may contain null values, even if it cannot be set to a null value.| |为只读IsReadOnly|`true` 如果不能修改的列;否则为`false`。`true` if the column cannot be modified; otherwise `false`.| |IsRowVersionIsRowVersion|如果列包含无法写入到的永久行标识符，但除了标识行没有有意义的值，设置。Set if the column contains a persistent row identifier that cannot be written to, and has no meaningful value except to identity the row.| |是唯一的IsUnique|`true`： 两行的基表 （BaseTableName 中返回的表） 可以具有相同的值在本专栏中。`true`: No two rows in the base table (the table returned in BaseTableName) can have the same value in this column. 保证是唯一的是`true`如果列本身表示一个键或仅适用于此列的 UNIQUE 类型的约束。IsUnique is guaranteed to be `true` if the column represents a key by itself or if there is a constraint of type UNIQUE that applies only to this column.

`false`: 列可以包含基础表中的重复值。`false`: The column can contain duplicate values in the base table. 此列的默认值是`false`。The default for this column is `false`.| |IsKeyIsKey|`true`： 此列是一组的行集中的列，合起来看，唯一标识行。`true`: The column is one of a set of columns in the rowset that, taken together, uniquely identify the row. IsKey 具有的列集设置为`true`必须唯一地标识行集中的行。The set of columns with IsKey set to `true` must uniquely identify a row in the rowset. 没有任何要求这组列是列的最小集。There is no requirement that this set of columns is a minimal set of columns. 这组列可能会生成从基表主键、 唯一约束或唯一索引。This set of columns may be generated from a base table primary key, a unique constraint, or a unique index.

`false`: 列不需要唯一标识行。`false`: The column is not required to uniquely identify the row.| |IsAutoIncrementIsAutoIncrement|`true` 如果列将值分配给固定增量; 中的新行否则为`false`。`true` if the column assigns values to new rows in fixed increments; otherwise `false`. 此列的默认值是`false`。The default for this column is `false`.| |BaseSchemaNameBaseSchemaName|中包含的列的数据源的架构的名称。The name of the schema in the data source that contains the column. 如果无法确定基本目录名称为 NULL。NULL if the base catalog name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为空值。The default for this column is a null value.| |BaseCatalogNameBaseCatalogName|包含的列的数据存储区中的目录的名称。The name of the catalog in the data store that contains the column. 如果无法确定基本目录名称为 NULL。NULL if the base catalog name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为空值。The default for this column is a null value.| |BaseTableNameBaseTableName|表或视图中包含的列的数据存储区的名称。The name of the table or view in the data store that contains the column. 如果无法确定基表名称，null 值。A null value if the base table name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseColumnNameBaseColumnName|数据存储区中列的名称。The name of the column in the data store. 这可能是不同的列名称列中返回，如果使用别名的列名称。This might be different from the column name returned in the ColumnName column if an alias was used. 如果无法确定基本列名或列数据中的行集列是派生的但并不完全相同，如果存储一个 null 值。A null value if the base column name cannot be determined or if the rowset column is derived, but not identical to, a column in the data store. 此列的默认值为空值。The default for this column is a null value.| 在结果集中的每个列返回一行。A row is returned for every column in the results set. 用于 ODBC 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序假定元数据信息后之一是可从 ODBC 驱动程序**SQLPrepare**， **SQLExecute**，或**SQLExecuteDirect**调用的函数。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC assumes that metadata information is available from an ODBC driver after one of **SQLPrepare**, **SQLExecute**, or **SQLExecuteDirect** functions are called. 对于"SchemaOnly"命令时要正常工作，行为**SQLPrepare**必须返回所需的元数据信息。For "SchemaOnly" command behavior to work correctly, **SQLPrepare** must return the required metadata information. 并非所有 ODBC 驱动程序支持此函数或返回元数据信息。Not all ODBC drivers support this function or return metadata information. 在这些情况下，部分或全部 SchemaTable 中的信息将会丢失。In these cases, part or all of the information in the SchemaTable will be missing. 在调用**SQLPrepare**，数据提供程序调用 ODBC **SQLColAttribute**函数，以便查找相关 （例如，IsLong，是唯一的在查询结果中每个列的元数据信息AllowDBNull，BaseTableName，BaseColumnName)。After calling **SQLPrepare**, The data provider calls the ODBC **SQLColAttribute** function to find the metadata information related to each column in the query results (for example, IsLong, IsUnique, AllowDBNull, BaseTableName, BaseColumnName). 如果基础驱动程序不返回其中一些信息，不会正确设置 SchemaTable 中的相应值。If the underlying driver does not return some of this information, the corresponding values in the SchemaTable will not be set correctly. 用于 ODBC 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序还会调用**SQLPrimaryKeys**检索每个表的密钥信息。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC also calls **SQLPrimaryKeys** to retrieve the key information for every table. 如果基础 ODBC 驱动程序不支持此函数，数据提供程序调用**SQLStatistics**并选择一个唯一索引作为表的主键。If the underlying ODBC driver does not support this function, the data provider calls **SQLStatistics** and chooses one of the unique indexes as the primary key for the table. 这通常不会产生所需的结果。This may not always give the results that you want. 需要正确标识的表的主键，才能正常工作。 needs the correct identification of the primary keys of the table in order to work correctly. 如果查询结果中每一列未返回 BaseTableName，用于 ODBC 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序会尝试分析要查找的表名称在查询中所涉及的 SQL 语句。If the BaseTableName is not returned for every column in the query results, the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC tries to parse the SQL statement to find the table names involved in the query. 这适用于 UPDATE、 INSERT、 DELETE 和简单的 SELECT 语句，但不是与存储的过程或基于联接的 SELECT 语句。This works with UPDATE, INSERT, DELETE and simple SELECT statements, but not with stored procedures or SELECT statements based on joins. 如果缺少此表中的部分或全部架构信息将无法正常工作，因为它具有足够的架构信息来自动生成正确的 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句。If some or all the schema information is missing from this table, the will not work correctly, because it has insufficient schema information to automatically generate the correct INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements. 若要确保元数据列返回正确的信息，必须调用行为参数设置为 KeyInfo。To make sure that metadata columns return the correct information, you must call with the behavior parameter set to KeyInfo. 否则，一些架构表中的列可能返回默认情况下，为 null，或不正确数据。Otherwise, some of the columns in the schema table may return default, null, or incorrect data. 当使用 ODBC.NET 到 Oracle 的 ODBC 驱动程序通过时，别名键列不会识别为键。When you use ODBC.NET to Oracle via the ODBC driver, aliased key columns are not recognized as keys. 这会影响 OdbcDataReader 的架构表中的 IsKey 和是唯一的列。This affects the IsKey and IsUnique columns in the schema table of the OdbcDataReader. 它还会影响生成更新逻辑 OdbcCommandBuilder 的功能。It also affects the OdbcCommandBuilder's ability to generate updating logic. 请考虑不针对主键列使用别名。Consider not using an alias for a primary key column. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft Jet ODBC 驱动程序始终返回唯一索引和主键列作为而不考虑它们是否可以为 null 或不可以为 null。The Microsoft Jet ODBC driver always returns unique index and primary key columns as nullable regardless of whether they are nullable or not. 该驱动程序也不返回主键信息;它只返回唯一索引和它们的列，包括但不区分在它们之间的主键列的列表。The driver also does not return primary key information; it only returns a list of unique indexes and their columns, including primary key columns, without differentiating among them.

returns.span: 数组中的 实例数。

span.span: The number of instances of in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数应用程序，方法提供了一种有效方式检索所有列，而不是逐个都检索每个列。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, instead of retrieving each column individually. 可以将传递数组，其中包含的结果行中包含的列数少于。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 数据量数组保存复制到数组。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 你还可以传递其长度是多个结果行中包含的列数的数组。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 对于 null 数据库列，此方法返回 。This method returns for null database columns. ## Examples [!code-csharp[OdbcDataReader_GetValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/odbcdatareader_getvalues/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OdbcDataReader_GetValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/odbcdatareader_getvalues/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认位置的之前第一条记录。The default position of the is before the first record. 因此，您必须调用，开始访问任何数据。Therefore, you must call to start accessing any data. 虽然正在使用中，关联正忙于为服务它直到您调用。While the is being used, the associated is busy serving it until you call . ## Examples 下面的示例创建、 一个，和一个。The following example creates an , an , and an . 该示例读取数据，将其写到控制台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最后，该示例关闭，然后。Finally, the example closes the , and then the . span.span: -1 for SELECT statements; 0 if no rows were affected, or the statement failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 读取所有行并在关闭之前未设置属性。The property is not set until all rows are read and you close the . 此属性的值是累积的。The value of this property is cumulative. 例如，如果在批处理模式下的值插入两个记录为 2。For example, if two records are inserted in batch mode, the value of will be 2. 并是后可以调用的唯一属性已关闭。 and are the only properties that you can call after the is closed.
